responses.text: Any chance you can install some augmentations on me?

dynamic_line.yes: Ah, <u_name>, of course, if you just want to take a seat over there. On the house, bet it's been busy out there lately.
dynamic_line.no: Of course, we tend to charge twelve thousand Ahn for a full checkup. Does that sound good? Sadly we do only take Credit currently, rather than notes.

dynamic_line: Hop on the bed, and we'll see what we can do.
